description.ko: 빛과 시간이 영원한 아름다움으로 뒤틀리는 우주 공허의 정적이고도 장엄한 광경입니다.
description.en: The silent majesty of the cosmic void, where light and time warp into eternal beauty.

prompt: A massive event horizon of a black hole surrounded by a swirling iridescent accretion disk and towering pillars of gaseous nebula in shades of #3D1A78 and #E6E6FA. Cosmic scale with billions of sharp star clusters in the background. Octane Render, 8k, hyper-realistic space simulation, volumetric gas clouds, raytracing, dramatic light warping around the void, and high-fidelity textures of cosmic dust.
